You can catch the colectivo from the corner of Calle Nicaragua and Calle Chihuahua near Puerta del Tierra. It costs $35 pesos one way and takes slightly less than an hour.

On foot, the site is not very big.
The entrance fee is $48 pesos, bring change as the lady selling the tickets might not have any.
There is a vending machine near the entrance selling drinks and snacks.
